Articles.Content: Not sure about whether there's going to be flora in the ground scatter on various planets, but I have some examples of real-life fungi that can be used as inspiration for in-game fungi that could fit with the feel of ksp. They came up in an unrelated discussion in which I mistook an image from a mod dev for a ksp 2 image, but I figured I'd post them here so the devs can have an easier time coming up with interesting otherworldly flora if they're looking to do so. Here's a link to a whole library of images: https://www.boredpanda.com/mushroom-photography/
Do we actually know if there will be trees and stuff on Kerbin? We saw it in various screenshots.

Do we actually know if there will be trees and stuff on Kerbin? We saw it in various screenshots.

It might be like KSP 1, but they might add more dense forests with the addition of rendering. It used to be that the entire planet was rendered, but now only what you can see is rendered, boosting performance.
